Aha Tiyamiyu bụ ihe ewepụtara site n'okwu Yoruba "Ti iya mi loju" nke pụtara na nne m bụ onye kacha ukwuu ma ọ bụ onye kacha hụ n'anya

Omenala ndị isi ọnụ na-ekwu na aha ahụ nke yiri Tiamiyu na nke otu ihe ahụ pụtara bụ nke mbụ nwoke nakweere—na Iperu, Ogun steeti Nigeria—bụ onye ọgọ mmụọ na mgbe a tọghatasịrị ya na Islam chọrọ aha pụrụ iche

Nwoke aha ya bụ Amusan bụ nwa nwa Bisuga (onye nna ya bụ otu n'ime ndị mbụ biri na Akesan-Iperu), onye isi Iperu sitere n'ụlọ eze Amororo na Iperu onye nyere ihe akaebe n'oge ọ na-achọ nnwere onwe Remo site na Ijebu ode.
Ọ bụ Amusan, nwa nwa nke lụrụ Sefinatuń nke nabatara aha Tiyamiyu., dị ka nke ndị Alakụba 'Tiamiyu'
